comments.name: remarks
comments.value:
Sets an entity on fire (if it is not in water or rain).
Note that you can call `getComponent('minecraft:onfire')` and, if present, the entity is on fire.

comments.name: param
comments.value: Length of time to set the entity on fire.

comments.name: param
comments.value: Whether side-effects should be applied (e.g. thawing freeze) and other conditions such as rain or fire protection should be taken into consideration.

comments.name: returns
comments.value:
Whether the entity was set on fire.
This can fail if seconds is less than or equal to zero, the entity is wet or the entity is immune to fire.
